A plan just for you

Monthly or discounted annual subscription

Manage the health journey of one person in one secure place.

Ideal for individuals who want full access to MiKare's features for a single profile — whether you're focusing on your own wellbeing or supporting one person as their health advocate.

Includes full feature access for one profile.

Get Started

A plan for the family

Monthly or discounted annual subscription

Manage the health journeys of up to five people in one secure place.

Designed for families and carers who want to organise records, track symptoms, and stay prepared across multiple profiles — all with full access to MiKare's features.

Includes full feature access for up to five profiles.

Get Started

Longitudinal insight, not isolated moments

Health rarely reveals itself in a single visit. MiKare emphasizes patterns over time so what once seemed random becomes interpretable, not just recorded.

MiKare Health

MiKare Health is the smart, family-friendly app that helps you track symptoms, detect patterns, and understand your health with clarity and confidence.
